About

Hi! My name is Ivan Rodrigues. I am currently working as a WEB/CMS Functional Analyst, with a strong passion for Web Development (technical skills) and UX Design (graphical skills) as well. With several years experience as a professional in the IT sector, I have acquired the skills and knowledge necessary to make your next project a success.

I love helping businesses and people with their digital transformation. My mantra is all about bridging the gap between your needs and their technical implementation, while keeping in mind to make the web a better and more accessible place for everyone.

If you believe I could be of any help to you or your company, please feel free to get in touch or connect!

Work experience

SMALS

Web/CMS Functional Analyst

Sep 2019 - Current

Since my studies, I have been working at SMALS as a Web-CMS oriented Functional Analyst. SMALS is an IT services non-profit organization working exclusively for the Belgian government. My main responsabilities are all about successfully managing web based projects.

Activities

  • Waterfall project management, with implementation of several Agile (Scrum) concepts
  • User stories redaction within JIRA and Confluence
  • Configuration of content-types and forms within ElasticMS (SMALS exclusive CMS)
  • Web/API development in Twig - Symfony’s PHP template language
  • Projects budget and effort estimations - writing of "Project Initiation Documents" (PID)
  • UX design & Wireframing
  • Leading various workshops and product demonstrations

BuSI

Internship as Business & Functional Analyst

Sep 2017 - Sep 2019

During my Business Analyst Master's Degree, I worked as a Junior Business & Functional Analyst at Business Systems Integration (BuSI), a consultancy IT services company.

Projects

  • EXPOST
  • APA & API
  • BISAM

Education

ICHEC Brussels Management School

After my marketing studies, I decided to take on a 2 years - half-time work and study - master’s degree about IT Business and Functional Analysis.

EPHEC

Marketing - Bachelor

After having first studied Sound Engineering & Music Production, I decided to start a bachelor’s degree in Marketing.
